common.welcome:
Hello, i am {name}-v{version}!
The bot that will create and judge the most spectacular battles for you!

To get started, please use the /config command to configure the bot.

errors.member_has_no_permissions: You do not have permission to use this command.
errors.error: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.

config.description: Configure the bot for this server

communication.request_embed_description: A quick battle request has been sent by {owner}.
communication.already_joined: You have already joined this battle.
communication.not_joined: You are not in this battle.
communication.only_owner_can_start: Only the battle owner can start the battle.
communication.only_owner_can_abort: Only the battle owner can abort the battle.
communication.battle_aborted_message: The battle request has been aborted.

environment.title: Environment Creation
environment.description: Please submit your environment description. Click the button below to submit.
environment.not_participant: You are not a participant in this battle.
environment.already_submitted: You have already submitted your environment.
environment.submitted: Your environment has been submitted successfully!

fighter.title: Fighter Creation
fighter.description: Please create your fighter. Click the button below to submit.
fighter.not_participant: You are not a participant in this battle.
fighter.already_submitted: You have already submitted your fighter.
fighter.empty_input: Fighter name and description cannot be empty.
fighter.submitted: Your fighter has been created successfully!

strategy.title: Strategy Submission
strategy.description: Please submit your battle strategy. Click the button below to submit.
strategy.not_participant: You are not a participant in this battle.
strategy.already_submitted: You have already submitted your strategy.
strategy.submitted: Your strategy has been submitted successfully!
